data.name: FirewallBlocked
data.comment: An error message shown when firewalls are causing problems {0} string, the folder path to SrvSurvey.exe

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_Activate
data.comment: Used on a button in FormBoxelSearch

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_Disable
data.comment: Used on a button in FormBoxelSearch

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_HideList
data.comment: Used on a button in FormBoxelSearch

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_NotViableMessage
data.value: Системное имя не является именем подсектора.
data.comment: Shown in FormBoxelSearch when attempting to boxel search a non generated system name
data.source: This is not a boxel generated system name.

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_SearchNotActive
data.comment: Shown in FormBoxelSearch status var when the feature is not active

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_ShowList
data.comment: Used on a button in FormBoxelSearch

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_SpanshUpdated
data.comment: Shown in FormBoxelSearch as notes for a system. {0} DateTime, a short formatted date

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_SpanshUpdatedBodies
data.comment: Shown in FormBoxelSearch as notes for a system. {0} DateTime, a short formatted date {1} int, a count of bodies in that system

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_UndiscoveredSystem
data.comment: Shown in FormBoxelSearch as notes for a system that has not been discovered

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_Visited
data.comment: Shown in FormBoxelSearch as notes for a system that was just visited {0} DateTime, the date and time the system was visited, usually now

data.name: FormBoxelSearch_VisitedCounts
data.value: Завершено {2} из {3} подсекторов, {0} систем из {1} в текущем подсекторе
data.comment: Shown in FormBoxelSearch status bar, summarizing how many systems have been visited {0} int, count of systems visited {1} int, total count of systems to be visited {2} int, count of boxels searched {3} int, total count of boxels to be searched
data.source: Completed {2} of {3} boxels, {0} of {1} systems in current boxel

data.name: NetSysData_DiscoveredAll
data.comment: {0} int, count of bodies

data.name: NetSysData_DiscoveredPartial
data.comment: {0} int, count of bodies, {1} int, total count of bodies

data.name: NetSysData_Encoded
data.comment: An Encoded Material Trader

data.name: NetSysData_Engineer
data.comment: Suffix after an Engineer's name

data.name: NetSysData_GuardianBroker
data.comment: A Guardian Tech Broker

data.name: NetSysData_HumanBroker
data.comment: A Human Tech Broker

data.name: NetSysData_Manufactured
data.comment: A Manufactured Material Trader

data.name: NetSysData_Raw
data.comment: A Raw Material Trader

data.name: Settings_CreateFolderNotFound
data.comment: Used in a message box when attempting to open a folder that does not exist.

data.name: UnexpectedWentWrong
data.value: Что-то пошло не так, пожалуйста, поделитесь логами.\r\nРекомендуется перезапустить SrvSurvey.
data.comment: An error message shown when something unexpected went wrong
data.source: Something unexpected went wrong, please share the logs.\r\nIt is recommended to restart SrvSurvey.
